meanings.sent1: The loud music had a suppressibility effect on my concentration.
meanings.sent2: The suppressibility nature of the medication helped calm her nerves.
meanings.sent3: His suppressibility reaction to scary movies always made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The suppressibility power of the mute button saved the day.
meanings.sent5: The suppressibility quality of the pillow made it perfect for noise reduction.

meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be suppressed.
meanings.sent1: The suppressibility of her emotions was evident in her calm demeanor.
meanings.sent2: The suppressibility of the protests showed the effectiveness of the new law.
meanings.sent3: The suppressibility of his laughter during the serious meeting caused a few chuckles.
meanings.sent4: The suppressibility of the volcano's eruption was a relief for the nearby town.
meanings.sent5: The suppressibility of the fire alarm made it easy to silence in case of false alarms.
